Weapon.Name: Chrono Blade
Weapon.Description: A sword that vibrates with the energy of the time stream, able to cut through moments.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift slash, the target is caught in a temporal lock.

Weapon.Name: Ethereal Lance
Weapon.Description: A spear that phases in and out of reality, making it nearly impossible to evade.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The lance strikes, binding the enemy's form with unseen chains.

Weapon.Name: Voidstaff
Weapon.Description: A staff that absorbs and redistributes energy from the void, weaving it into destructive spells.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: Energy from the void silences the enemy, stifling their abilities.
